amendment.description: Providing emergency assistance and health care response for individuals, families, and businesses affected by the 2020 coronavirus pandemic.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1578 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1578 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S2059, S2060; text: CR S2063-2156) Providing emergency assistance and health care response for individuals, families, and businesses affected by the 2020 coronavirus pandemic.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1578 proposed by Senator McConnell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1578 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
